LanguageData.Spaceports_NetworkInfo: There are {0} tanks on the network holding a total of {1} fusion fuel.
LanguageData.Spaceports_DryModeWarning: Warning: without being placed on water, fuel processor will run at 33% efficiency.
LanguageData.Spaceports_DryModeWarningDBH: Warning: fuel processor requires water piping to operate at full efficiency.
LanguageData.Spaceports_FFTerrain: Fusion fuel processor must be placed in shallow water, a river, or on terrain that supports Heavy.

LanguageData.Spaceports_ModeDry: Operating mode: dry (33% of max efficiency)
